items.content_html: A lightweight animation library featuring JavaScript scroll animations powered by GSAP and a complementary CSS-only animation system. Add beautiful scroll-triggered or instant animations to any element using simple data attributes. Perfect for Webflow projects and custom websites.
items.title: austin-thesing/quick-web-animations: A lightweight animation library featuring JavaScript scroll animations powered by GSAP and a complementary CSS-only animation system. Add beautiful scroll-triggered or instant animations to any element using simple data attributes. Perfect for Webflow projects and custom websites.

items.content_html: MCP Bridge is a lightweight, fast, and LLM-agnostic proxy for connecting to multiple Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers through a unified REST API. It enables secure tool execution across diverse environments like mobile, web, and edge devices. Designed for flexibility, scalability, and easy integration with any LLM backend.
items.title: INQUIRELAB/mcp-bridge-api: MCP Bridge is a lightweight, fast, and LLM-agnostic proxy for connecting to multiple Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers through a unified REST API. It enables secure tool execution across diverse environments like mobile, web, and edge devices. Designed for flexibility, scalability, and easy integration with any LLM backend.

items.content_html: A lightweight and responsive weather application built using React.js.
items.title: prajesh8484/WeatherU: A lightweight and responsive weather application built using React.js.

items.content_html: Lightweight CLI tool enabling collaborative Markdown task list management between developers and AI agents.
items.title: ultrawideturbodev/pewPewCLI: Lightweight CLI tool enabling collaborative Markdown task list management between developers and AI agents.

items.content_html: OpenETL is a free, lightweight, and flexible ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) framework built in TypeScript, designed for developers who need a simple yet powerful tool to orchestrate data workflows in Node.js environments.
items.title: jspreadsheet/openetl: OpenETL is a free, lightweight, and flexible ETL (Extract, Transform, Load) framework built in TypeScript, designed for developers who need a simple yet powerful tool to orchestrate data workflows in Node.js environments.

items.title: vedas-dixit/mesh-fetch: A lightweight, customizable API request handler

items.content_html: A lightweight JavaScript library designed to simplify authentication when interacting with the Commerce Layer API. It works everywhere. On your browser, server, or at the edge.
items.title: commercelayer/commercelayer-js-auth: A lightweight JavaScript library designed to simplify authentication when interacting with the Commerce Layer API. It works everywhere. On your browser, server, or at the edge.

items.content_html: Flexi Grid is an advanced, lightweight, and customizable Angular 19 data grid component
items.title: FlexiUI-labs/flexi-grid: Flexi Grid is an advanced, lightweight, and customizable Angular 19 data grid component

items.content_html: ClassTrack is a lightweight scheduling tool that helps students and administrators manage class schedules without conflicts. Easily add new classes, detect time overlaps, and keep your timetable organized and clash-free.
items.title: adk-saugat/ClassTrack: ClassTrack is a lightweight scheduling tool that helps students and administrators manage class schedules without conflicts. Easily add new classes, detect time overlaps, and keep your timetable organized and clash-free.

items.content_html: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.
items.title: hany226/vibe-coding-starter-pack-3d-multiplayer: A lightweight 3D web-based multiplayer starter kit using Three.js, React, and SpacetimeDB. Build interactive multiplayer experiences with real-time synchronization, character movement, and customizable game mechanics.

items.content_html: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.
items.title: ajstyle4u/DivCopy: DivCopy is a lightweight browser extension that helps frontend developers quickly inspect, copy, and reuse web elements.

items.content_html: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.
items.title: sazzadhossainmilon/got-scraping-client: got-scraping-client is a lightweight and efficient tool for web scraping tasks using the popular Got HTTP client. It simplifies data extraction from web pages by providing a straightforward API and built-in support for handling common challenges like pagination and rate limiting.

items.content_html: RiftJS: A lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Riot Games API, providing easy access to League of Legends game data.
items.title: Jonatansilx/RiftJS: RiftJS: A lightweight Node.js wrapper for the Riot Games API, providing easy access to League of Legends game data.

items.content_html: Lightweight, intelligent IDE for the Lua programming language that runs entirely within the web browser. The core idea is to leverage modern web technologies and small, efficient machine learning models (using ONNX Runtime Web and Transformers.js) to provide features like code explanation directly in the client-side environment.
items.title: rohinp/lua-code-editor: Lightweight, intelligent IDE for the Lua programming language that runs entirely within the web browser. The core idea is to leverage modern web technologies and small, efficient machine learning models (using ONNX Runtime Web and Transformers.js) to provide features like code explanation directly in the client-side environment.

items.content_html: A lightweight React library that provides a headless component and a custom hook to easily implement resizable UI elements.
items.title: nnthanh01061999/react-resizable: A lightweight React library that provides a headless component and a custom hook to easily implement resizable UI elements.

items.content_html: The purpose of TavernCall is to provide a lightweight and thematic online platform for tabletop role-playing game (TTRPG) players to find or create game groups. The website allows users to create temporary "signals" indicating their availability or interest in forming a group. Others can view these signals and reach out via Discord.
items.title: teberzin/TavernCall:  The purpose of TavernCall is to provide a lightweight and thematic online platform for tabletop role-playing game (TTRPG) players to find or create game groups. The website allows users to create temporary "signals" indicating their availability or interest in forming a group. Others can view these signals and reach out via Discord.

items.content_html: A lightweight event-driven microservices package for RabbitMQ in Node.js. Enables asynchronous communication, message publishing and consuming, and scalable event-driven architecture. Perfect for distributed systems and real-time applications.
